Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-34062 affecting package conda for versions less than 24.1.2-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-34062 affecting package conda for versions less than 24.1.2-2. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package conda is earlier than 24.1.2-2, affected by CVE-2024-34062
